ygData.subject: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been stuck at skill level 40 in Forage ever since I picked up the skill at lvl 12 (I m now 16th).  Very disappointing in that I can t really rely on
ygData.messageBody:
I've been stuck at skill level 40 in Forage ever since I picked up the skill
at lvl 12 (I'm now 16th). Very disappointing in that I can't really rely on
forage to provide 100% of my food and drink needs. Looks like it never
will.

-Alex
aka: Goatnatos, Lvl 16 Bard, Povar Server

> -----Original Message-----
> From: errors-160851-721-candel=pobox.com@onelist.com
> [mailto:errors-160851-721-candel=pobox.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
> Ethric
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 4:52 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Cap
>
>
> From: "Ethric" <ethric@...>
>
>
> This is true for "most" abilities but not "all." I personally have been
> stuck at skill level 40 in Forage for 5 levels (now 17th). Is anyone else
> experiencing a skill cap on Foraging?
>
> Ethric - Bard of Qeynos (Xegony)
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Fun Bob <fun-bob@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 6:25 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Cap
>
>
> > From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
> >
> > Just to get everyone clear on the subject, your skill cap is
> > 5 Times your Level, +5
> > So, say your 10th level, your skill cap will be 55
> > 10*5=50+5=55
> > Rolande, drunken Bard of Povar
> >
> >
